conventions.dash_policy: classify em/en/hyphen as separate tokens; all dash types normalize to "-"
conventions.bracket_policy: strip underscores and outer brackets from stage spans

spans.text: DUKE of ALBANY, married to Goneril.
DUKE of CORNWALL, married to Regan.
EDMUND, younger bastard son to Gloucester.
Knights attending on the King, Officers, Messengers, Soldiers and
